metadata.title: CVE-2024-24786 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: The protojson.Unmarshal function can enter an infinite loop whenunmarshaling certain forms of invalid JSON. This condition can occur whenunmarshaling into a message which contains a google.protobuf.Any value, orwhen the UnmarshalOptions.DiscardUnknown option is set.

criterions.comment: google-guest-agent: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
google-osconfig-agent: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
